title: Why conspiracy theories might be right: The algorithms behind everything
description: Cathy O'Neil, author of "Weapons of Math Destruction", talks to Chuck about the bias behind mathematical algorithms and asks whether it's time for a digital Bill of Rights.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
